item.title: Connecting an ESP8266 to Eclipse Hono
item.description: This tutorial explains how to generate an Arduino sketch for a given Information Model and send the device data to Eclipse Hono via MQTT.

item.title: Connecting a GrovePi to Eclipse Hono
item.description: This tutorial explains how to generate a simple Python application for you GrovePi that sends sensor data to Eclipse Hono using MQTT.

item.title: How to describe a TI SensorTag device with Vorto
item.description: This tutorial explains how to describe a device with Vorto using the example of a TI SensorTag. Read more about the benefits of Vorto in this blog post. Prerequisite Github account Device you want to describe Related specifications Let’s get started Before you start, you need to understand what kind of information you need to describe your device with Vorto. You might find yourself confronted with a long list of specifications, but not all of them are needed.
